data.name: FarmVR
data.description: FarmVR is an immersive 360-degree video player where user's can experience some of Australiaâ€™s most amazing Agricultural properties. From beef, sheep, dairy to dried fruit. Designed to help you learn how food is produced, the important role that agricultural plays in Australia (and the world), encourage agriculture as a career pathway and to be entertained.

changelog.change_log: - GearVR Compatibility - New Loading Feedback on 360 Environments - Activity Log feature centralized through ThinkDigital VR Product Suite - New Profile layout with Activity Log - New Video Control Layout - Video Buffering feedback - Powered by Think.Digital VR branding - Version code output - Bug fixes

- New Loading Feedback on 360 Environments
- Activity Log feature centralized through ThinkDigital VR Product Suite
- New Profile layout with Activity Log
- New Video Control Layout
- Video Buffering feedback
- Powered by Think.Digital VR branding
- Version code output

- Selectable buttons in Media lists
- Offset rotation compatibility

- Full Offline Mode
- Stereoscopic mode in video playback
- Improve text display on category buttons
- Loop feature
- New delete button layout
- Fix crash issues by using progressive download and save.
